Objective: Start clinical pilot safely (site ready, legal/privacy, baseline frozen)
Inputs: Protocol/ICF approved; app build; site SOP; data flows
Exit criteria: DR-2 signed; baseline freeze; staff trained; dry run passed

Objective: Collect and freeze synchronous golden dataset (iPhone+reference)
Inputs: Acquisition SOP; labeling SOP; reference export pipeline
Exit criteria: Dataset v1 frozen; QA complete; coverage targets met

Objective: Meet accuracy/valid-rate criteria on golden dataset
Inputs: Acceptance criteria; BA scripts; regression suite
Exit criteria: All primary metrics within thresholds; QS calibrated

Objective: Technical file ready (Annex II/III + GSPR + CER/CEP + RMF + PMS/PMCF)
Exit criteria: Master index shows no blocking TBDs; signoffs complete

Objective: Software/Cybersecurity bundle ready; intended use aligned to class/risk
Exit criteria: Index complete; anomalies resolved or justified
